items.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18872)
items.content_html:

Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere

items.title: Justice
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Justice

McClain died after being injected with a sedative during a police stop in Aurora, Colorado, near Denver.

aljazeera.com

Police, medics charged for 2019 death of Elijah McClain

McClain died after being injected with a sedative during a police stop in Aurora, Colorado, near Denver.McClain died after being injected with a sedative during a police stop in Aurora, Colorado, near Denver.

items.title: We hope you enjoy the long weekend! We'll be taking a break...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

We hope you enjoy the long weekend! We'll be taking a break too but will be back September 11th with tamales and cake from Yessenia!

items.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoThe Denver Post was live.Colorado Attorney General Phil Weiser is announcing the results of a grand jury investigation...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoThe Denver Post was live.

Colorado Attorney General Phil Weiser is announcing the results of a grand jury investigation into the death of Elijah McClain. Story: https://dpo.st/3jBbpXi

items.title: we had a great day today.  We had a new town and we celebrated...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

we had a great day today. We had a new town and we celebrated the birthday of one of our allies Helen, thank you for always supporting us,

We’re moving! 🥳 We’re so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, we’re moving up the street to sel...l the same delicious food at @metrocaring. We’re so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

See More

We’re moving! 🥳 We’re so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, we’re moving up the street to sel...l the same delicious food at @metrocaring. We’re so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

items.title: Today we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our...
items.content_html: Sanctuary4All ColoradoToday we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our meals. We hope to have the support of each of you as always. each impacted family continues in the fight. see you on Saturday at our inauguration and at our new addressToday we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our meals. We hope to have the support of each of you as always. each impacted family continues in the fight. see you on Saturday at our inauguration and at our new address

items.title: We’re moving! 🥳 We’re so grateful to have had the space...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is at Metro Caring. · Denver

We’re moving! 🥳 We’re so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, we’re moving up the street to sell the same delicious food at @metrocaring. We’re so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

items.title: we are in a new locación , we ask you to continue supporting...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

we are in a new locación , we ask you to continue supporting each impacted family, our new locación is in metro caring , 1100 e 18 ave denver co 80218, 5 minutes from the church where we were. at the same time from 1 to 3

Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a necessary surgery to treat a hernia. Without insurance, she’s been ineligible to even schedule the su...rgery until it got worse, and she still has to raise the money to pay for it and take time off work afterward. Buying gorditas, and sharing the sale with family and friends, is one way you can help. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

See More

items.title: Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a necessary surgery to treat a hernia. Without insurance, she’s been ineligible to even schedule the surgery until it got worse, and she still has to raise the money to pay for it and take time off work afterward. Buying gorditas, and sharing the sale with family and friends, is one way you can help. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

items.title: Memories
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado shared a memory.

Memories

3 Years AgoSee Your Memorieschevron-rightJeanette Vizguerra is with Luz Garcia and Elvira Arellano in Chicago, Illinois.

Gracias a cada persona que me hicieron sentir increible cin sus atenciones en Chicago dias de conocer gente nueva creando conecciones y lazos de apoyo mutuo gra...cias Luz Garcia pir la invitacion y cada dia hasta el mas sabio aprende cosas nuevas gracias por poner en mi vida mujeres guerreras Cecilia Garcia. Elvira Arellano. Ana Burciaga. Emma lozano. Pastora Jacobita. Pastor Gustavo y pastora Maria medina. Pastora Lucrecia Mercado. Taina Rodriguez Constituent Advocate and Congresista Jan Schakowsky al Cinsul de Mex en Chicago fueron dias productivos donde pude ver a mis primos Eva. Y Juanma Ramirez hasta la proxima.

items.title: Protest in solidarity with Afghanistan! Please show up if you...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Protest in solidarity with Afghanistan! Please show up if you can.

Alt image: Emergency Protest in black, bolded letters, followed by a Black fist with black, red, and green explosion behind it. The wrist has the Afghanistan flag wrapped around it. Near the bottom are black, red, and green handprints layered on top of each other.

Information on protest as followed:...
August 19, 2021
Gather at 6 P.M. for a rally followed by a march.

Colorado State Capitol
200 E Colfax Ave. Denver, CO 80203

We march on Afghanistan's national day of independence demanding an end to proxy wars, forced displacements, and the recent terrors unleashed upon Afghanistan.

Mask and carpooling encouraged.
Parking available along Lincoln Ave and Sherman St.

Contact: Zmhashem0209@gmail.com

See More
